RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Post-doc in Philosophy at the Facultй de Philosophie of the Institut Catholique de Toulouse (ICT) (2015). Ph.D. in Philosophy and Cognitive Sciences at the University Vita-Salute San Raffaele (UNISR) (2013). Master degree in Philosophy of History at the University Vita-Salute San Raffaele (UNISR) (2009).
